power.title: Advancing Lunge
power.fluff: You spring forward to make a quick attack
power.section: true Effect: You shift up to 2 squares, and a minimum of 1 square.
true 1 Light Blade or Spear: Shift up to a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier instead.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Miss: If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
Effect: If you did not shift the full distance, you can shift the remaining squares.

power.title: Armor-Piercing Strike
power.fluff: You drive your weapon through a weak point in your foe's defenses
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. Reflex
1 Axe or Heavy Blade: You can make the attack against Fortitude instead
1 Light Blade or Spear: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Pick: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Blinding Smash
power.fluff: A sharp blow leaves your enemy seeing only starts
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: Damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + the number of healing surges you have expended, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Critical: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn or (save ends), whichever lasts longer.
true 1 Hammer or Mace: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Bull Charge
power.fluff: You take a brutal swing that knocks your enemy backward, allowing you to step forward and attempt a knockdown
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: You push the target up to 1 square, then shift the same distance to a space adjacent to it.
If you used this power on a charge, make the secondary attack.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon the same target Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and you knock the target prone.

power.title: Crushing Blow
power.fluff: Taking a full swing, you deliver a brutal blow to a foe trapped between you and an obstacle
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
1 You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is between you and blocking terrain
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If the target is prone, you deal an additional +1[W] damage.

power.title: Dance of Steel
power.fluff: Testing your enemy's defenses with your weapon weaving in and out, you lash out with a sudden attack that leaves your foe in immobilizing pain
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
true If the target is already immobilized, you also knock it prone.

true 1 Pick: If the target is already immobilized, you can choose to also deal additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier and prevent the target from getting up from prone before the start of your next turn.
true 1 If you deal this damage, you cannot use your weapon until the start of your next turn and cannot willingly move so that the target is no longer within your reach.

power.title: Daunting Onslaught
power.fluff: You bring down your fury upon an enemy, frightening nearby foes with your brutality
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true The target and each enemy adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Intimidate:If you are trained, each enemy adjacent to the target also takes the penalty.
Miss:The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Deflecting Shield
power.fluff: As you hammer your foe with an attack, you move your shield to deflect its counterattack to another enemy
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Effect: The first time the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, one enemy adjacent to you other than the target also takes the minimum damage for the attack. This can make the enemy take damage twice from the same attack if it was already a target for the attack.

power.title: Immediate Vengeance
power.fluff: An attack gets through, but you smash your shield down upon the attacker with crippling force
power.section: Trigger: An enemy within your touch reach hits you or an ally with a melee attack
Attack: Melee touch the triggering enemy Strength +3 vs. Fortitude
1 Level 11: Strength +6
true Hit: 1d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the start of its next turn.
true 1 Critical: +1d10 critical damage.
true 2 Level 6: +2d10 critical damage.
Level 11:+3d10 critical damage.

power.title: Parry and Riposte
power.fluff: You parry an attack and quickly counter with your own, throwing your foe off balance
power.section: Trigger: An enemy within your reach misses you or an ally with a melee attack
Attack: Melee weapon the triggering enemy Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

power.title: Power Strike
power.fluff: By pushing yourself beyond your limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe
power.section: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a Fighter at-will attack
true Effect: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage.

power.title: Precise Strike
power.fluff: You make sure you land an attack on your opponent
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength +4 vs. AC
1 Roll the attack twice and use either result
true Hit: Half of 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Half of the minimum damage roll for the attack.

power.title: Probing Attack
power.fluff: With a careful strike, you find a weak spot in your enemy's defenses
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. Reflex
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true You gain a +4 power bonus to all attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Miss: You gain a +2 power bonus to all attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Rain of Blows
power.fluff: You become a blur of motion, raining a series of blows upon your opponent
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] damage.
true 1 Axe or Pick: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Flail: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon the same target Strength vs. AC
1 Heavy Blade: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier.
1 Polearm or Staff: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.
true Hit: 1[W] damage.
true 1 Hammer or Mace: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Light Blade or Spear: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Restoring Strike
power.fluff: Your weapon impacts with a satisfying crunch, filling you with new confidence
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength -4 vs. AC
1 You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if you are bloodied
1 You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-third the number of healing surges you have expended
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier + one-half the number of healing surges you have remaining damage.
true If you use your second wind before the end of your next turn, you regain additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
If you are bloodied, this power gains the Invigorating keyword and you gain temporary hit points equal to your 2 + Constitution modifier.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action.

power.title: Rhino Strike
power.fluff: Rushing into the thick of battle, you smash your foe with your eager attack
power.section: true 1 Shield: If you are using a shield, your movement during the charge does not provoke reactive strikes.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true The attack deals +1 additional damage for each square beyond 2 you move during the charge.
Miss: If you moved more than 2 squares during the charge, you deal your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Shield Edge Block
power.fluff: You retaliate to your your foe's attack with a quick slam of your shield's edge that hinders its aim
power.section: Trigger: An enemy in your touch reach targets you with a melee or close attack
Attack: Melee touch one creature Strength +3 vs. Fortitude
1 Level 11: Strength +6
true Hit: 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Critical: +2d6 critical damage.
true 2 Level 11: +3d6 critical damage.
Effect: The target takes a penalty to all attack rolls for the triggering attack equal to your Wisdom modifier, and cannot score a critical hit against you with the attack.

power.title: Shield Slam
power.fluff: You follow up a successful attack by slamming your shield into the enemy, knocking it aside
power.section: Trigger: You hit an enemy within your touch reach with a melee attack
true Effect: The triggering attack deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier and you push the target up to 1 square.
true 1 Critical: If the triggering attack was a critical hit, you knock the target prone.

power.title: Slamming Rush
power.fluff: You yank your grabbed foe across the battlefield before slamming it to the ground
power.section: true Effect: You move up to your speed. You do not provoke a reactive strike from the target for this movement.
true For each square you move, you slide the target 1 square to a space adjacent to you. The creature remains grabbed for this move.
Attack: Melee touch the same target Strength vs. Fortitude (unarmed)
true Hit: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

true If the target is adjacent to blocking or damaging terrain, add you Dexterity modifier to the damage. If the damaging terrain has a damage type, you can choose for this to be a separate damage instance of that type. This does not give this attack the damage keyword.

power.title: Sweeping Blow
power.fluff: Seeing your enemies press in, you swing your weapon in a wide arch to strike many of them at once
power.section: Attack: Close weapon burst each enemy in the burst you can see Strength vs. AC
1 Axe or Pick: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Constitution modifier
1 Flail or Heavy Blade: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier
1 Staff: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss (two weapons): If you are wielding two melee weapons, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.
